page.title: 14FESTIVALS
page.content:
{Loders Country Fayre Loders Country Fayre is held once a year in June, on the field at Wellplot (Loders). At the fayre you have lots of games, stalls and every year you have a person in the stocks who you throw wet sponges at. Here are some of the things that happen:Tug o'war, Mini tractor competition, pony rides, Majorettes display, Silver band and silly races including the seven-legged race.
{The May Fair} The May Fair is held once a year in May, in Loders school. First of all you have the procession and crowning of the May queen. Then the maypole dancing. After that they go into the school to the stalls, games and food. Most years they have pony rides.
